title: 386: The World is AI and We’re All Gonna Die w/ Bachelor Clues & Will Sasso!
itunes:title: 386: The World is AI and We’re All Gonna Die w/ Bachelor Clues & Will Sasso!
description:
WILD! The Broads are joined by Chad Kultgen (aka Bachelor Clues) and Will Sasso to discuss their podcast “Dudesy” - the first podcast ever ran by an AI program named Dudesy! Bekah and Jess laugh their asses off and are shook hearing about how this AI (Dudesy) has access to all their personal emails, phone cameras, social media and more to curate this podcast! It’s seriously UNREAL. They also chat living in the simulation, aliens, black holes, a future AI version of the Bachelor/ette, Bekah drops some Bachelor BTS tea, and much more!

 

DUDESY:

Watch Dudesy here: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCO7QB0sO4vPkCNltYTb33qw 

Listen to Dudesy here: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/dudesy/id1611415318 

Follow Dudesy here: https://www.instagram.com/dudesypodshow/ 

Follow Chad (Bachelor Clues) here: https://www.instagram.com/bachelorclues/ 

Follow Will here: https://www.instagram.com/willsasso/ 

Follow Game of Roses here: https://www.instagram.com/gameofrosespod/
